div.div: Infrared and Raman spectra of the epiisopiloturine, epiisopilosine, isopilosine, pilosine and macaubine alkaloids using the theoretical model B3lyp/6-311++G(d,p).
div.p: a) IR spectra of the five alkaloids, b) zoom of the highest IR peak, c) Raman spectra of the five alkaloids, and d) zoom of the highest Raman peak.
